metadata.title: CVE-2024-26969 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: clk:qcom: gcc-ipq8074: fix terminating of frequency table arrays The frequencytable arrays are supposed to be terminated with an empty element. Add suchentry to the end of the arrays where it is missing in order to avoidpossible out-of-bound access when the table is traversed by functions likeqcom_find_freq() or qcom_find_freq_floor(). Only compile tested.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
